content.question: ZIP Code Area Number of Customers Number of Transactions Total Transaction Amount Amount per Transaction 43253 24 28 $3,486.00 $124.50 43267 46 53 $3,309.85 $62.45 43269 6 8 $810.40 $101.30 43285 4 4 $288.40 $72.10 43286 35 43 $6,052.68 $140.76 The table shows the types of information collected by a store regarding customer purchases. skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify the different types of data presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
